transcript:
Customer: Hello?
Executive: Hello? Good morning sir.
Customer: Hello?
Executive: Sir, speaking from IndiaMART head office, your account manager. Sir, your call came.
Executive: Haanji, your call came na sir, that's why I couldn't call back at that time. Abhi bataiye.
Customer: Actually, by mistake aaya tha call shayad. Main toh nahi maara.
Executive: Achha. Okay, okay.
Executive: So okay, by mistake aaya tha. Waise koi issue toh nahi aa raha aapko usme?
Customer: [inaudible] nahi aa raha.
Executive: Nahi, nahi, nahi aa raha. Okay. Actually, main dekh rahi thi na sir, aap matlab abhi active nahi hai matlab apne portal par, seller panel pe. Toh abhi kuch issue aa raha hai matlab aap use nahi kar rahe hain, kuch other issues?
Customer: Actually, mere paas stock nahi hai isliye main toh active nahi hu.
Executive: Okay, okay, okay.
Customer: Actually, import hona, woh yeh container aane ke liye two months hota hai.
Executive: Okay. Actually, meri na aap se last time bhi baat hui thi. Us time pe bhi aap active nahi the. Toh matlab stock ka problem rehta hi hai generally kya?
Customer: Mera stock ka problem mein yeh mere ko itna time bhi nahi milta hai. Kyunki mera locally zyada rehta hai na market.
Executive: Okay.
Customer: Main ispe dhyan bhi nahi deta hu.
Executive: Aap owner hai na yaha pe?
Customer: Haan, haan, haan.
Executive: Okay. Aur aap hi use kar rahe hain. Isliye shayad timing ka issue hota hai. Kyunki abhi kya hai ki abhi toh aap matlab fir nahi use kar rahe hain toh aapka listing jo thoda hai na visibility ka down, down ja raha hai woh. Aur dusri cheez aapko jo buyleads wagera milte hai obviously sab kuch hi waste ja raha hai. Toh is concern mein maine aapko call bhi karne, maine shayad aapko pehle maine hi call kiya tha aapko isi concern se related ki aap use nahi kar rahe hain toh kuch issues hai ya fir kuch bhi. Toh aapke paas koi other employee hai kya jo handle kar sakta hai IndiaMART ka portal toh they can also handle agar aisa hai toh.
Customer: Okay, okay.
Executive: Okay, okay. Aap unko but log haan.
Customer: Hum is business mein 25 years se hai. Kyunki hamara pura andar local market hi zyada hai matlab. IndiaMART contact kiya hai maine, unki zarurat padti nahi hai.
Executive: Nahi, sir, I understand.
Customer: Kyunki woh bhi karte hai na kuch chota chota quantity puchte hai, kam quantity puchte hai, 100 kg aisa puchte hai.
Customer: Utna toh hum deliver bhi nahi kar sakte. Kyunki hum sirf high volume pe karte hai na.
Executive: Main woh toh main samajh rahi hu sir ki aapka high volume pe hai. Aap bulk mein karte hai deal. But uske liye abhi dekhiye offline aapka achha chal raha hai usme no doubt. But aap just online matlab IndiaMART pe add on hue honge. Toh kuch socha hoga aapne ki haan bhai ab online bhi karna hai aisa karke kuch. Tabhi aapne onboarding ki hogi ya fir sirf marketing ke liye aapne kiya ki marketing hoti hai.
Customer: [inaudible]
Executive: Ab aap 25 years se offline chal rahe hain aur sudden aapne socha ki ab online bhi karna hai. Toh obviously yeh bhi socha hoga ki online business ko badhayenge ab. Offline toh wohi gaya sir. Dekhiye jab 25 years ho jaate hai na fir usme aapko itna struggle, itni mehnat karne ki zarurat nahi hai. Kyunki aapke buyers hai, hai na? Ab online aap aaye hain usse time dene ab agar sirf marketing ke liye aaye hai ki mujhe apna firm jo hai MN Diamond usko online dikhana hai. Toh that is the different thing. But agar isse aapko business bhi chahiye toh fir woh use karna padega. Kyunki three months ho rakhe hai. Abhi zyada time nahi hua hai aur bilkul bhi woh matlab aur rahi baat jo calls aa rahi hai usme keh rahe hai aapki chhoti chhoti woh queries karta hai.
Customer: Haan, haan, chhoti chhoti queries karte hai.
Executive: Okay. Toh aapka minimum order quantity kya rehta hai?
Customer: Minimum apna 5 ton tak rehta hai. 5 ton, 10 ton bhi de sakte hai.
Executive: Hmm hmm hmm hmm. Waise aapka rehta hai baki 5 ton, 6 ton itna hai.
Customer: Haan, haan, haan.
Executive: Aur aur pan India hai, hai na?
Customer: Haan, haan, haan.
Executive: Theek hai. Toh matlab dekhiye ek toh bahut achha benefit yeh hai na ki aap pan India deal karte hai. Toh usme kya hai ki aapko opportunities zyada milengi. But uske liye sir dekhiye aisa nahi hai ki maine apna IndiaMART pe hi form khol diya aur waha se business aata rahega. Usko use toh karna hi padega aapko. Basic, basic aapka hai na cheez chal raha hai. Agar aisa nahi hai toh aap kisi ko handover karke aur yeh bol sakte hai ki theek hai aap buyleads wagera consume kariye jisse call aapke paas jayega. Jo abhi teen call, yeh jo do number aapne add kar rakhe hai dono aapke hi hai.
Customer: [inaudible]
Executive: Ek 64 aur ek triple five wala dono aapke hai. Theek hai. Toh other person agar buylead use karta hai aur usse matlab aapki visibility increase hoti hai toh calls toh fir bhi aapke paas jayega. Toh calls aur direct inquiries pe thoda sa na ratio achha hota hai. Abhi aap use nahi kar rahe toh aap direct inquiries bhi nahi check kar rahe. Aur isse kuch nahi hoga sir. 6 mahine, 7 mahine baad aapka ek perception ban jayega ki IndiaMART se kuch bhi nahi hota aur bekar hai aur us time pe hum kuch nahi kar sakte.
Customer: Sir, yeh bas mere ko time nahi milta hai aur mera interest hi nahi hai isme aisa hai. Thoda time nahi milta hai aur main dekhta bhi nahi hu.
Executive: Haan.
Executive: Bilkul, bilkul. Toh wohi hai. Theek hai agar aap kisi ko handover karte hai theek hai. Otherwise aap dekhiye do teen, do teen buyleads wagera aapko bulk mein definitely mil jayega.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer is not active on the portal.

- Customer is not using buyleads.

- Customer receives small quantity inquiries.

- Customer says he doesn't have time.



Resolution:

- Executive inquired about the reason for inactivity.

- Executive explained the benefits of using the portal.

- Executive suggested handing over the account to someone else.



Next Steps: 

None



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- inactivity, buyleads, portal, business
